```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Importing the PLUTO data
library(tidyverse)
pluto_20v8 <- read_csv("~/Desktop/Urban_Planning_Methods/pluto_20v8.csv")
```
# Filtering by my census tracts
```{r }
## listing out the census tracts
# 36081055500,
# 36081055300,
# 36081055700,
# 36081055900
south_ridge_tracts <- c("55",
                    "53",
                    "57",
                    "59")

pluto_cleaned <- pluto_20v8 %>%
  filter(borough %in% "BK" & ct2010 %in% south_ridge_tracts)

write_csv(pluto_cleaned, file = "~/Desktop/Urban_Planning_Methods/pluto_cleaned.csv")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
